abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of SmartThinQ LGE Sensors is allowed.
abort.no_smartthinq_devices: No SmartThinQ devices found. Component setup aborted.

error.error_url: Error retrieving login URL from ThinQ.
error.invalid_url: Invalid redirection URL. Make sure you can access the ThinQ app on your phone. You can get support [over here](https://git.io/JTjid).

user.description: Select your SmartThinQ account localization information.
user.title: SmartThinQ LGE Sensors

url.description: Use the URL in the first field to perform login to SmartThinQ with your credentials, then paste the URL where the browser is redirected after the login in the second field. Share feedback about your setup [here](https://git.io/JU166).
url.title: SmartThinQ LGE Sensors - Authentication

token.description: Save the generated token for future use, then confirm to complete the configuration.
token.title: SmartThinQ LGE Sensors - New refresh token
